docs.snippet: The popular Mr. Scott, who was the network’s most prominent black anchor and made “Booyah!” his signature expression, had been ill with cancer....
docs.lead_paragraph: The popular Mr. Scott, who was the network’s most prominent black anchor and made “Booyah!” his signature expression, had been ill with cancer.
docs.abstract: Stuart Scott, ESPN sportscaster who became known for his arsenal of exuberant references and catchphrases, dies at age 49; was network's most prominent black anchor.
